{{technician.technicianName}} has not been assigned to any work orders yet!

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Location } from '@angular/common'; import { TechnicianService } from '../technician.service'; import { Technician } from '../technician'; import { WorkOrder } from '../work-order'; import { WorkOrderService } from '../work-order.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-technician-detail', templateUrl: './technician-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./technician-detail.component.css'] }) export class TechnicianDetailComponent implements OnInit { id: number; technician?: Technician; workOrders?: WorkOrder[]; constructor(private router: Router, private route: ActivatedRoute, private technicianService: TechnicianService, private workOrderService: WorkOrderService, private location: Location) { this.id = Number(this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id')); } /** * Calls the getTechnician function after the page loads * to ensure the call doesn't return empty due the the page load order */ ngOnInit(): void { this.getTechnician(); } /** * Generates the technician.id by capturing the `:id` from the URI slug. * If that technician does not exist, the web app will re-route to a 404 page. */ getTechnician(): void { this.technicianService.getTechnician(this.id).subscribe(technician => { if (technician) { this.technician = technician; } else { this.error404(); } }); } /*getWorkOrders(): void { this.workOrderService.getFilteredWorkOrders(this.id).subscribe(workOrders => this.workOrders= workOrders); }*/ /** * This method creates a simple route to the previous page */ goBack(): void { this.location.back(); //causes browser to go to root } /** *This method attempts to redirect to the 404 page if the workOrder does not exist */ error404(): void { this.router.navigateByUrl('404'); } }
